data.text: @pjhn22 @rTIKId @MarkLevineNYC @nycHealthy @Yale @NYCMayor Basically, people who donâ€™t like lockdowns should be on board with masking but no 🙄

@MarkLevineNYC @nycHealthy @Yale No Mark, this is a lie

Imagine trying to use false predictions full of massive deaths counts to prove an intervention works

Fortunately we have Sweden to debunk you -notice esp that their ICUs have been empty for 6 months

Oddly your booster+lockdown+masking failed to do that https://t.co/GkkgjcKou6

@MarkLevineNYC @nycHealthy @Yale This model is so unbelievably flawed. It assumes death rates based on only reported cases, ignores the impact of therapeutics and treatments, mostly ignores natural immunity, and also appears to not account for Omicron being a much more mild strain. https://t.co/LhvMyEkr30

@MarkLevineNYC @nycHealthy @Yale It is stunning anyone would believe that.
NY, especially NYC, failed to flatten the curve in early/mid 2020. Sadly, numerous vulnerable died, as they weren't protected. But, substantial immunity developed in the population, preventing heavy disease in subsequent seasonal surges, https://t.co/nRMyOAB1NB
@BjjJoshD @MarkLevineNYC @nycHealthy @Yale It's a waste of breath on you. Truly.
@BjjJoshD @al0_s1 @MarkLevineNYC @nycHealthy @Yale I am glad you are fine, almost 1 million ppl were not so lucky.
